abstract.text: Convenience view that encpsulates the
and makes it automatically redrawable and adaptable.
Basic floating point data type.
Same as Pan Gesture but stricly horizontal, ideal for swipe cell/object actions.
A view modifier that enables swipe-to-dismiss functionality for views.
Users can swipe in the specified direction to trigger a dismiss action.
The view will follow the drag gesture and dismiss when swiped beyond a threshold.
A class that manages a queue of
tasks, allowing control over the maximum number of concurrent tasks.
Global Haptic control for various types of different vibrations.
A presentation controller that has a dimming view and presents from the bottom, as a drawer behavior.
Represents the edges of a rectangle with individual values for each side.
Loads the font inside the compiled collection of bundles.
A structure that provides comprehensive information about a country.
A structure that represents a log entry with a
and
log message.
A type alias for an asynchronous task that takes an
instance and returns
This class creates a single unique loop running with the interval defined by the constant
In memory key/value cache that works as a lightening cache layer 2 over any other storage.
It allows the value to be read from the cache or if not found allows the caller to set it.
A shape that applies rounded corners to specific corners of a rectangle.
This shape allows you to round only selected corners rather than all corners uniformly,
providing more flexible corner radius customization for views.
Key-Value temporary in memory storage (RAM).
Objects can be added and removed from this shared
storage.
Represents a line segment with a start and an end point.
Represents the corner radii of a rectangle with individual values for each corner.
A view modifier that provides visual feedback when the user presses on a view.
This modifier applies scale and opacity changes to simulate a press effect,
commonly used for buttons and interactive elements.
A subclass of
that represents an asynchronous operation.
A protocol that provides comprehensive data management capabilities with optimized caching and optional throttled persistence.
A protocol that provides reactive data binding capabilities with automatic lifecycle management.
A view modifier that provides smooth animated transitions for text content.
This modifier automatically detects numeric values within text and animates them
when the source text changes, creating smooth counting or value transition effects.
It preserves text formatting and attributes while animating only the numeric portions.
Logger is an enumeration that defines different logging levels.
Keychain is a key-value storage. Each instance can be configured differently,
although the underlaying data persistence is the same. The Keychain store is attached to the
main bundle.
